delete.description:
Revoke an Authentiq ID using email & phone.

If called with `email` and `phone` only, a verification code 
will be sent by email. Do a second call adding `code` to 
complete the revocation.

post.description:
Register a new ID `JWT(sub, devtoken)`

v5: `JWT(sub, pk, devtoken, ...)`

See: https://github.com/skion/authentiq/wiki/JWT-Examples

schema.description: Authentiq ID in JWT format, self-signed.

delete.description: Revoke an Identity (Key) with a revocation secret

parameters.description: Public Signing Key - Authentiq ID (43 chars)
parameters.name: PK

get.description: Get public details of an Authentiq ID.

parameters.description: Public Signing Key - Authentiq ID (43 chars)
parameters.name: PK

parameters.description: Public Signing Key - Authentiq ID (43 chars)
parameters.name: PK

post.description:
update properties of an Authentiq ID.
(not operational in v4; use PUT for now)

v5: POST issuer-signed email & phone scopes in
a self-signed JWT

See: https://github.com/skion/authentiq/wiki/JWT-Examples

parameters.description: Public Signing Key - Authentiq ID (43 chars)
parameters.name: PK

schema.description: Authentiq ID in JWT format, self-signed.

put.description:
Update Authentiq ID by replacing the object.

v4: `JWT(sub,email,phone)` to bind email/phone hash; 

v5: POST issuer-signed email & phone scopes
and PUT to update registration `JWT(sub, pk, devtoken, ...)`

See: https://github.com/skion/authentiq/wiki/JWT-Examples

parameters.description: Public Signing Key - Authentiq ID (43 chars)
parameters.name: PK

parameters.description: test only mode, using test issuer
parameters.name: test

schema.description: Claim in JWT format, self- or issuer-signed.

429.description: Too Many Requests on same address / number `rate-limit`

head.description: HEAD to get the status of a verification job

authority updates a JWT with its signature
